Overview  Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
Packages
com.alvermont.javascript.tools.shell Contains a slightly modified version of the Mozilla Rhino Javascript Shell.
com.alvermont.terraj Contains things that are intended to be shared across the applications and the topmost classes only.
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet Contains the parameter objects and the top level user interface and examples for the Fracplanet port.
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.colour Contains classes that hold and process RGB colour information.
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom Contains all geometry related classes including points, vertices, triangles, flat and spherical geometries and the meshes and terrains that are built out of them.
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.io Contains I/O related functionality including POV export and colour file processing.
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.noise Contains code related to noise generation.
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.render Contains code concerned with terrain rendering and display.
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.rings Contains code to integrate with the Rings Raytracer
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.ui Contains code that handles the Swing user interface for the fractal planetary terrain generator.
com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.util Contains utility code used by the other packages in this application.
com.alvermont.terraj.launcher Contains code for the top level Launcher dialog.
com.alvermont.terraj.planet Contains a Java port of the planetary terrain generator originally written by Torben AE Mogensen.
com.alvermont.terraj.planet.io Contains code related to writing generated images to files or similarly processing them.
com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project Contains code related to the various map projections supported by the program.
com.alvermont.terraj.planet.ui Contains the Swing user interface for the planetary terrain generator.
com.alvermont.terraj.stargen Contains all the code for the Stargen and Dole accretion libraries.
com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.dole Contains the Dole accretion simulation code and an example of how to use it.
com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.evaluator Contains the code for evaluating planets and solar systems in terms of habitability, possibility of planets existing etc.
com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.ui Contains code for the Swing user interface for Stargen.
com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.util Contains utility code used by the Stargen and Dole accretion code.
com.alvermont.terraj.util.io Contains Swing related utility code that is shared among all the applications.
com.alvermont.terraj.util.ui Contains Swing related utility code that is shared among all the applications.
com.meghnasoft.async Contains the AbstractAsynchronousAction code by Alamgir Farouk to provide a framework for running long-lived tasks in Swing on their own threads.
